explains: v. 以为，表示意见，说明

sentences.en: The founding father will continue to opine.
In my opine, it is a shame to deceive your Friends.
sentences.cn: 我认为，这是一个耻辱，来欺骗你的朋友。

sentences.en: Dermatologists opine that as much as 90 percent of aging is caused by sun exposure.
sentences.cn: 皮肤学家认为由于曝晒导致的肌肤衰老高达90%。
